greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Distance from 2^n to the next prime.
comment: Essentially the same as A013597. - T. D. Noe, Jul 17 2007
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..5000
example: a(13)=17 because 2^13=8192 and the next prime is 8209=8192+17
results.author: Helmut Richter (richter(AT)lrz.de), Mar 30 2004
